meanings.definition: A disorder of structure or function in a human, animal, or plant, especially one that produces specific signs or symptoms.
meanings.sent1: Many people fear catching diseases from others.
meanings.sent2: Doctors work hard to treat various diseases in patients.
meanings.sent3: The party was so fun, it was like a contagious disease spreading joy to everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her negativity was like a disease infecting the whole office.
meanings.sent5: The image of the virus spreading through the body helped students understand how diseases work.

meanings.definition: An abnormal condition affecting the body of an organism.
meanings.sent1: The zoo took extra precautions to prevent diseases among the animals.
meanings.sent2: Vaccines are important in preventing diseases in children.
meanings.sent3: His obsession with cleanliness was like a disease, making him scrub everything multiple times.
meanings.sent4: The rumors spread through the small town like a fast-spreading disease.
meanings.sent5: The impact of pollution on wildlife was evident in the spread of diseases among the population.
